statements: SELECT * FROM financial_assets;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price, sale_price FROM financial_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_date FROM financial_assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price FROM financial_assets WHERE sale_price IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(purchase_price) AS avg_purchase_price, MAX(purchase_price) AS max_purchase_price FROM financial_assets;
SELECT * FROM financial_assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, sale_price FROM financial_assets WHERE sale_date IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(purchase_price) AS average_purchase_price, MAX(sale_price) AS max_sale_price FROM financial_assets;
SELECT * FROM financial_assets WHERE purchase_price > 5000 AND purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, sale_date FROM financial_assets ORDER BY sale_price ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price FROM assets ORDER BY purchase_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT return_id, return_value, return_date FROM returns;

SELECT assets.asset_name, assets.asset_type, returns.return_value FROM assets JOIN returns ON assets.asset_id = returns.asset_id WHERE assets.asset_type = 'Stock' AND returns.return_date >= '2021-01-01'

SELECT assets.asset_name, assets.purchase_price, returns.return_value FROM assets JOIN returns ON assets.asset_id = returns.asset_id WHERE returns.return_value > 1000 ORDER BY assets.purchase_date DESC

SELECT assets.asset_name AS Name, assets.purchase_price AS Price, returns.return_value AS Return FROM assets LEFT JOIN returns ON assets.asset_id = returns.asset_id WHERE assets.asset_type = 'Real Estate' AND returns.return_value IS NOT NULL

SELECT assets.asset_name, assets.purchase_price, returns.return_date FROM assets LEFT JOIN returns ON assets.asset_id = returns.asset_id WHERE assets.purchase_price <= 50000 OR returns.return_value < 0

SELECT assets.asset_name, assets.asset_type, returns.return_value, returns.return_date FROM assets JOIN returns ON assets.asset_id = returns.asset_id WHERE assets.asset_type = 'ETF' ORDER BY returns.return_date ASC
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM assets ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price FROM assets WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date FROM assets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT a.asset_name, i.investment_amount, r.return_amount FROM assets a JOIN investments i ON a.asset_id = i.asset_id JOIN returns r ON i.investment_id = r.investment_id;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_price FROM assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT investments.investment_id, assets.asset_name, investments.investment_amount FROM investments JOIN assets ON investments.asset_id = assets.asset_id;

SELECT returns.return_id, investments.investment_id, returns.return_amount, investments.investment_amount FROM returns JOIN investments ON returns.investment_id = investments.investment_id WHERE returns.return_amount > investments.investment_amount;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets ORDER BY asset_type DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_price FROM assets JOIN prices ON assets.asset_id = prices.asset_id WHERE price_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Bond' ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT p.asset_id, p.price_date, p.asset_price, a.asset_name FROM prices p INNER JOIN assets a ON p.asset_id = a.asset_id WHERE p.asset_price > 100 ORDER BY p.price_date DESC;

SELECT i.investment_id, i.investment_amount, i.investment_date, a.asset_name, a.asset_type FROM investments i INNER JOIN assets a ON i.asset_id = a.asset_id WHERE i.investment_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY i.investment_date ASC;

SELECT r.return_id, r.return_amount, r.return_date, i.investment_id, a.asset_name FROM returns r INNER JOIN investments i ON r.investment_id = i.investment_id INNER JOIN assets a ON i.asset_id = a.asset_id WHERE r.return_amount < 0 ORDER BY r.return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Asset;
SELECT asset_name, price FROM Asset WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, price FROM Asset ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Asset;
SELECT asset_name, quantity * price AS total_value FROM Asset;
SELECT * FROM Asset LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_name, price FROM Asset WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT A.asset_name, I.investment_date, R.return_amount FROM Asset A INNER JOIN Investment I ON A.asset_id = I.asset_id INNER JOIN ReturnOnInvestment R ON I.investment_id = R.investment_id WHERE R.return_percentage > 5;
SELECT AP.date, AP.closing_price, AP.daily_return, AC.category_name FROM AssetPerformance AP INNER JOIN AssetCategory AC ON AP.asset_id = AC.asset_id ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT A.asset_name, I.amount_invested, R.return_amount, R.return_percentage FROM Asset A INNER JOIN Investment I ON A.asset_id = I.asset_id LEFT JOIN ReturnOnInvestment R ON I.investment_id = R.investment_id WHERE R.return_amount IS NOT NULL;
